isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Mirrors - Heated &Motorized

svcproc.title: Mirrors - Heated &Motorized
svcproc.para: Refer to Accessory Power in POWER DISTRIBUTION & GROUND SYSTEM for description of accessory power circuits to A3 Accessory Adapter (501). Refer to HEATED MIRRORS AND RIGHT MOTORIZED MIRROR circuit diagram in CTS-5119S for the following discussion.

Heated Mirror -The heated mirror switch (438) receives power from A3 Accessory Adapter (501) through 10A fuse F5-A with the key in the or position. With the switch ON, power is applied to the heater element in the mirrors. Note that the mirror switch includes two LEDs.
The LED that receives power from terminal 6 with the mirror switch ON is illuminated to indicate that the mirror heaters are ON. The LED between terminals 7 and 8 is used to illuminate the switch.

Right Motorized Mirror -The right motorized mirror switch (437) receives power from A3 Accessory Adapter (501) through 10A fuse F5-A with the key in the or position. Momentarily positioning the switch down from the neutral position closes the circuit between switch contacts 1 - 2 and 4 - 5. This applies voltage to the motor on circuit 78F and grounds the motor through 78E.

Momentarily positioning the switch up from the neutral position closes the circuit between switch contacts 2-3 and 5-6. This applies voltage to the motor on circuit 78E and grounds the motor through 78F.
